data.title: Hollywood Walk of Fame
data.meta_description: Actress and Producer Courteney Cox was honored by the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce on February 27, with the 2,750th star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in the category of Television.
data.text:
Courteney Cox

WHO | HONOREE Courteney Cox

EMCEE Lupita Sanchez Cornejo, Chair of the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce

GUEST SPEAKERS Jennifer Aniston, Lisa Kudrow, and Laura Dern

WHAT Dedication of the 2,750th star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame

WHEN Monday, February 27, at 11:30 AM PT

WHERE 6284 Hollywood Boulevard

WATCH LIVE The event will be streamed live exclusively at walkoffame.com

Actress and Producer Courteney Cox was honored by the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce on February 27, with the 2,750th star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in the category of Television.

The Hollywood Chamber of Commerce has proudly hosted the globally iconic Hollywood Walk of Fame since 1960. The Chamber exists to transform business and improve lives. Through the Walk of Fame, the Chamber celebrates the business that transforms us all – the business of entertainment. Entertainment is a unique blend of art and enterprise: elevating and inspiring us all.

ABOUT OUR HONOREE

“We are thrilled to welcome Courteney Cox to the Hollywood Walk of Fame! Courteney has played some momentous roles during her career, and we know there is much more to come,” stated Ana Martinez, Producer of the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

“I am happy to add, that her star is just a few feet away from her friend and now fellow Walk of Famer Jennifer Aniston,” added Martinez.

Courteney Cox is a renowned actor, producer and director.

She gained international recognition as the neurotic yet loveable Monica Geller, on the Emmy Award winning comedy “Friends” which lasted 10 seasons.

After Friends, Courteney segued into her Golden Globe® nominated role as Jules Cobb, a recently divorced mom in her forties facing the humorous challenges, pitfalls and rewards of life’s next chapter in the comedy sitcom “Cougar Town.” Cox also served as Executive Producer on the show.

Cox will soon reprise her iconic role as Gale Weathers in Scream VI, the sixth installment in the cult classic franchise and will return to her critically acclaimed role as troubled novelist Patricia Phelps in the horror-comedy series Shining Vale, which is set to premiere its second season later this year.

Her additional film credits include: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, Bedtime Stories, 3000 Miles to Graceland, Mr. Destiny, Cocoon: The Return, The Longest Yard and many others.

Courteney is also an accomplished director and established producer via her Hopper Productions banner. Among her various credits, Courteney served as an executive producer and the host of Facebook Watch’s documentary series, 9 Months with Courteney Cox. The widely popular series received a 2021 Daytime Emmy Award nomination as well as a nomination for the first annual Critics’ Choice Real TV Awards.

In 2021, Courteney joined her former Friends co-stars for the highly acclaimed, reunion special which received a Primetime Emmy® Award nomination for “Outstanding Variety Special.”

In addition to Courteney’s remarkable career in entertainment, she recently launched the award-winning homecare line, Homecourt.

Courteney is dedicated to her philanthropic work with organizations such as The Epider-molysis Bullosa Medical Research Foundation and she is also a longtime supporter of The ALS Golden West Chapter.
